Title: A Very Harold & Kumar 3D Christmas
Writer: Jon Hurwitz, Hayden Schlossberg, Jon Hurwitz (characters), Hayden Schlossberg (characters)
Actors: Patton Oswalt, Isabella Gielniak, Kal Penn, Austin Bickel
Plot: Six years after their Guantanamo Bay adventure, stoner buds Harold Lee and Kumar Patel cause a holiday fracas by inadvertently burning down Harold's father-in-law's prize Christmas tree.
tomatoConsensus: Still raunchy, still irreverent, and still hit-and-miss, this Harold & Kumar outing also has a Christmas miracle: The audience gets to see the sweeter side of the duo.
